actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the exemption from section 7872 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 of loans made to the Country of Poland.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that the tax treatment of loans with below-market interest rates shall not apply to bonds issued by the country of Poland.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the exemption from section 7872 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 of loans made to the Country of Poland.
